headlines.headline: Phoenix bounce back with win over JackJumpers
headlines.description: South East Melbourne Phoenix put on a strong offensive showing to defeat the Tassie JackJumpers by 16 points.

headlines.headline: 36ers come from behind to steal win over Breakers
headlines.description: Adelaide 36ers overcame a double digit deficit to defeat the NZ Breakers by 3 points.

headlines.headline: PJC caps off big Breakers half with buzzer-beater
headlines.description: Parker Jackson-Cartwright scores right on the buzzer to extend NZ Breakers' lead at halftime

headlines.headline: VJ Edgecombe leads Team Vince to 1-point win over Team Melo
headlines.description: Philadelphia rookie VJ Edgecombe led Team Vince to victory in the Rising Stars event at NBA All-Star Weekend.

headlines.headline: NBA All-Star 2026: Live updates, highlights through the weekend
headlines.description: All of the live updates, top moments and results from NBA All-Star 2026 weekend in Los Angeles.

headlines.headline: Dylan Harper sinks game-winner over his brother Ron Harper Jr.
headlines.description: Dylan Harper hits a fadeaway game-winner over his brother Ron Harper Jr. at the NBA Rising Stars game.

headlines.headline: What's next for the Seahawks? Why a critical offseason awaits
headlines.description: Seattle has to make decisions on a new OC and whether to re-sign Super Bowl MVP Kenneth Walker III.

headlines.headline: Is Trevor Lawrence's 2025 success sustainable?
headlines.description: Trevor Lawrence's final eight games propelled him to being named an MVP finalist in 2025. Can he continue it next season?

headlines.headline: Zachary Orr joining Seattle as ILBs coach, sources say
headlines.description: The Seahawks are hiring former Ravens defensive coordinator Zachary Orr as their inside linebackers coach, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter and Jeremy Fowler on Friday.

headlines.headline: Cardinals announce Rallis, Hackett, Ghobrial coordinator hires
headlines.description: The Arizona Cardinals officially announced the retention of DC Nick Rallis and the hiring of OC Nathaniel Hackett and special teams coordinator Michael Ghobrial on Friday.

headlines.headline: Bills coach Joe Brady adds John Fox as senior assistant
headlines.description: New Bills coach Joe Brady has added NFL head coaching experience to his staff, hiring John Fox as a senior assistant coach. The Bills announced Fox and more of the team's coaching staff, which now includes 20 assistants, on Friday.

headlines.headline: 'Reflections of the Lombardi': NFL tales of Super Bowl victory
headlines.description: Check out what it means to hold the Lombardi Trophy from those who have lifted it.

headlines.headline: Olympics 2026 men's hockey: Standings, stats, schedule, more
headlines.description: Find the full schedule, scoring and goaltending leaders and group standings here.

headlines.headline: Olympic hockey betting odds: Canada men, United States women favored to win Olympic gold
headlines.description: Who are the favorites and underdogs in the men's and women's 2026 Olympic ice hockey tournaments?

headlines.headline: Finland earns feisty win over Sweden in Olympic men's hockey
headlines.description: Finland's men's hockey team revived its Olympic campaign by outmuscling archrival Sweden in a 4-1 group stage victory Friday -- 20 years after the sides squared off in the gold medal game at the Turin Games.

headlines.headline: Switzerland's Kevin Fiala out of Olympics with leg injury
headlines.description: Switzerland forward Kevin Fiala has been ruled out for the rest of the Milan Cortina Olympics with an injury to his left leg.

headlines.headline: Grades, lessons from Canada's Olympic hockey win vs. Switzerland
headlines.description: Canada has two victories and a 10-1 goal differential in the tournament. Here's how Game 2 was won.

headlines.headline: NHL 26 is free to play on Xbox over this weekend
headlines.description: Game Pass subscribers can jump into the most recent hockey game from EA at no extra cost, plugging away at its career mode and multiplayer.
